controller

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonController, MyController

    public interface Controller
    the controller links between the view and the model,which not familiar with each other
    Since:
    2015-12-16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Chen Zissu
